testcase.name: Check the login functionality in Amazon
testcase.system-out: Given Amazon website is successfully loaded in browser......................passed When User clicks on sign in button on homepage..............................passed Then User verifies that the login page is displayed.........................passed When User logins to the application by entering the username and password...passed Then User verifies that the amazon home page is displayed...................passed When User logs out of the application.......................................passed Then User verifies that logout should happen successfully...................passed
